svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2023-09-05T16:03:59.406Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/14.6.13 Chrome/89.0.4389.128 Electron/12.0.7 Safari/537.36" etag="Xwb5xXODFXPV3FnLHIIg" version="14.6.13" type="device"><diagram id="j39BeKSZk83gd--y38wb" name="第 1 页"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 358px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 1px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 350px; height: 1px; padding-top: 33px; margin-left: 6px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 270px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
# threadNum: size_t //线程数量
# threadIds: vector<int> //线程id数组
# activeThreadCount : atomic<size_t> //正在执行的线程数量
# idleThreadCount : atomic<size_t> //空闲的线程数量
# stopping : bool //是否正在停止
# rootThread : int //主线程id
# struct FiberOrCb{
Fiber::ptr fiber;
std::function<void()> cb;
int thread = -1;}- threads : vector<Thread::ptr> //线程数组
- fibers : list<FiberOrCb> //协程任务队列
- root_fiber : Fiber::ptr //user_caller时的调度协程
- name : string //调度器名称
cc_thread_local : t_scheduler: Scheduer* //当前线程的调度器
cc_thread_local : t_scheduler_fiber: Fiber* //当前线程的调度协程

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 350px; height: 1px; padding-top: 315px; margin-left: 6px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 208px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
+ Scheduler () //如果user_caller, 将m_rootFiber的运行函数设
为Scheduler::run
s+ GetMainFiber() //获取线程局部变量t_scheduler_fiber
# stopping():bool //判断 m_stopping
&& m_fibers.empty() && m_activeThreadCount == 0
+ start():void //创建线程池，并将线程运行函数设为
Scheduler::run
+ stop():void
+ run():void

switch.text: + Scheduler () //如果user_caller, 将m_rootFiber的运行函数设...

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
